meanings.definition: A type of sweet pepper used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added cubanelle to the stir-fry for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The salad tasted delicious with fresh cubanelle slices.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cubanelle refuse to be chopped? It was too sweet to be sliced!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the vibrant colors of a cubanelle, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cubanelle filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: The plant that produces cubanelle peppers.
meanings.sent1: The cubanelle plant in the garden is growing well this season.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take care of the cubanelle plants to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The cubanelle plant waved in the breeze, as if greeting the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like a cubanelle plant in full sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the cubanelle plant rustled softly in the wind.
